sense.name: 60 minutes
sense.commentary: hr - a period of time equal to 1/24th of a day
sense.examples: The job will take more than one hour. I'll meet you here in three hours.

sense.name: time of day
sense.examples: The hour is getting late. I work best in the late-night hours. We're going downtown for happy hour today.

sense.name: memorable period
sense.examples: It was their finest hour. My hour of triumph lasted only ten minutes. The hour of thier death came all too soon.

sense.name: distance
sense.commentary: distance measured by the time taken to cover it
sense.examples: We live an hour from the airport. It's just two hours away.
